description: {"blocks":[{"key":"94sc6","text":"Simple 5-minute experiment to demonstrate volume of air to children.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"2gcld","text":"Take a large bowl and fill with water, almost to the top.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dgq2j","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":2,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"avqdd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32595","guid":"B6475930E5E911E8A8C8ADF6C7C7A82F","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/94vcz36.png","placeholder":"","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-11-11 at 11.40.13 AM.png","mime":"image\/png","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":"","is_image":true}}],"guid":"36DAA6C0E5E911E8A8C8ADF6C7C7A82F","id":681976,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Preparation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8ilc","text":"Get a dry cup that can fully fit inside the bowl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eta7a","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"8efu5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32596","guid":"0A944FC0E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/94wcz36.jpg","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/94xcz36.jpg","original_name":"IMG_1303.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":""}}],"guid":"D4D946B0E5E911E8A106174FE74DBD26","id":681977,"previous_guid":"36DAA6C0E5E911E8A8C8ADF6C7C7A82F","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fagm7","text":"Add tape to the bottom of the cup (double-sided or rolled up to be sticky from both sides).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"199nl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"6q9cm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b61im","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32600","guid":"8F6A81B0E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/942cz36.jpg","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/943cz36.jpg","original_name":"IMG_1304.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"key":"8ktj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}}},{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32602","guid":"A6F32260E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/944cz36.jpg","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/945cz36.jpg","original_name":"IMG_1305.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":""}}],"guid":"1618C470E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","id":681978,"previous_guid":"D4D946B0E5E911E8A106174FE74DBD26","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aku8t","text":"Crumple a piece of napkin or paper towel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3k1vr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"816b9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32606","guid":"EF5F5370E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/948cz36.jpg","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/949cz36.jpg","original_name":"IMG_1306.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":""}}],"guid":"B9534430E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","id":681979,"previous_guid":"1618C470E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bqgs","text":"Insert the paper towel into the cup, attaching to the bottom.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cco16","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"fg8d5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3i4n2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6locr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32608","guid":"46109FD0E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/95acz36.jpg","placeholder":"","original_name":"IMG_1307.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":"","is_image":true}},{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"key":"1lu3","text":"The paper should be fully inside the cup, away from the open edge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d8inb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}}],"guid":"F90D5A70E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","id":681980,"previous_guid":"B9534430E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","section":null}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fi0lg","text":"Carefully push the cup, face down, into the bowl. Do not tilt the cup.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d2hfl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"5ceeb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32609","guid":"C424C720E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/95bcz36.jpg","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/95ccz36.jpg","original_name":"IMG_1308.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":""}}],"guid":"7711CA50E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","id":681981,"previous_guid":"F90D5A70E5EA11E8A106174FE74DBD26","section":"Experiment"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bp0b","text":"Submerge the cup fully, so the water covers the top of the cup.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"all4q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"ctbda","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32611","guid":"E162E470E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/95dcz36.jpg","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/95ecz36.jpg","original_name":"IMG_1309.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":""}}],"guid":"C6BF6F30E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","id":681982,"previous_guid":"7711CA50E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","section":"Experiment"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b815n","text":"Carefully lift the cup, removing it from the bowl without tilting. Once removed, tilt slightly and let the water drip off.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"vb23","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"a5pcc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32615","guid":"3290E7C0E5EC11E8A106174FE74DBD26","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/95hcz36.jpg","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/95icz36.jpg","original_name":"IMG_1310.JPG","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":690,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":""}}],"guid":"E64BE950E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","id":681983,"previous_guid":"C6BF6F30E5EB11E8A106174FE74DBD26","section":"Experiment"}
